journal-title-group.journal-title: International Journal of Pharmaceutical and Life Sciences

abstract.p: Two research paper, one review article and one conceptual paper are included in this issue. Due to delayed feedback concerning post-review revision from authors, some articles are not included in this issue. We expect fast response from authors if their article is sent back to them to edit. Thanks to all who were involved in review process, technical/functional support and authors who sent their papers to this journal.
